city_not_found: City not found. Please enter a valid city name
aqi_error: Unable to fetch AQI data. Please try again later
general_error: Something went wrong. Please try again later
geolocation_error: Geolocation is not supported by this browser
location_name_error: Unable to fetch city name from your location
location_general_error: Something went wrong with location. Please try again later
location_access_error: Unable to access your location. Please enable location services
dark_mode_desc: Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable viewing
large_text_desc: Increase text size for better readability and accessibility
voice_demo: This is your Weather App speaking. All systems are working perfectly! You can use voice assistance for better accessibility.
about_desc: A modern, accessible weather application providing real-time weather data, forecasts, air quality monitoring, and multilingual support. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion for the best user experience across all devices.
